name: Domin'Ant
storyline:
Domin'Ant is a confrontational game between Gerard, a 40-year-old, living alone in his run-down house, and Cassandra, the ant who will do anything to burn the house down. 
 
CASSANDER, Kick your inverted self out of his house! 
Use your communication skills and the strength of your companions to loot and take possession of Gerard's house. But beware of Gerard because his soles will not hesitate to reduce you and your ant-hill to mush. 
 
GERARD, EVERYTHING IS PERMITTED TO DEFEND YOUR TERRITORY 
Whether it's scotch, your sole, a book, or your last bottle, all the tools are good to defend you from cassandra and its anthill that want to ravage your home.
summary: Domin'Ant is a game of confrontation between Gerard, an alcoholic in his forties, driven by loneliness in his dilapidated house, and Cassandra, the ant who will do anything to reduce it to ashes.
